name: mirai-extensions
description: Collection of Mirai platform extensions for VS Code

scripts.compile: npm run compile:auth && npm run compile:figma && npm run compile:jira
scripts.compile:auth: cd mirai-auth && npm install && npm run compile
scripts.compile:figma: cd mirai-figma && npm install && npm run compile
scripts.compile:jira: cd mirai-jira && npm install && npm run compile
scripts.watch: npm run watch:auth & npm run watch:figma & npm run watch:jira
scripts.test: npm run test:auth && npm run test:figma && npm run test:jira
